Property.name: EnableSpeedFixes
Property.HelpText: Some objects and animations in SADX weren't adjusted for 60 FPS, these fixes correct them. Disable for a more vanilla-like SADX experience.

Property.name: EnableDreamcastWaterRipple
Property.HelpText: Enable the water ripple model from the Dreamcast version. Scroll down to the Branding section for the title screen ripple effect.

Property.name: CutsceneSkipMode
Property.HelpText: Improves handling of skippable cutscenes. Cutscenes can be skipped with a single button press. Fade to black makes skipping cutscenes smoother.

Property.name: EnableCutsceneFix
Property.HelpText: Restore camera transitions that are supposed to happen after cutscenes (experimental).

Property.name: EnableImpressFont
Property.HelpText: Enable the fonts from DC/GC versions of the game. Use Impress for English and Comic Sans (experimental) for other European languages.

Property.name: DisableFontSmoothing
Property.HelpText: SADXPC adds a white outline that makes the font look thicker. Disable this to make the text sharper (like SA1).

Property.name: ColorizeFont
Property.HelpText: Imitate the DC SA1 subtitle font color. Disabling this will make the subtitle font white.

Property.name: EnableDreamcastBranding
Property.HelpText: Restore menu textures, options, button prompts, tutorials etc. from the Dreamcast version.

Property.name: EnableWindowTitle
Property.HelpText: Change the game's window title to Sonic Adventure instead of SonicAdventureDXPC. Disable this for compatibility with Fusion's Chao Editor.

Property.name: EnableSETFixes
Property.HelpText: Object layout improvements by supercoolsonic. Off reverts to original SET files from SA1 (incompatible with Mission Mode!). Extra adds unused scenery.

Property.name: EnableLSDFix
Property.HelpText: Make Sonic travel farther (like on the Dreamcast) when using the Light Speed Dash. This is required for compatibility with original Dreamcast SET files.

Property.name: EnableSkyChaseEnemyModels
Property.HelpText: Restore models and textures for Sky Chase enemies and the Egg Carrier. This is force enabled when Dreamcast Characters or HD GUI are loaded.

Property.name: RevertEmeraldCoastDrawDistance
Property.HelpText: Revert skybox scale in Emerald Coast. The ocean will no longer be aligned with the horizon, but fog and draw distance will be the same as in SADX.

Property.name: RemoveCream
Property.HelpText: Disable Cream cameos in Station Square.

Property.name: DisableSA1TitleScreen
Property.HelpText: Restore the original SADX title screen but keep other improvements from DC Branding.

Property.name: SA1LogoMode
Property.HelpText: Select how the logo should be positioned on the title screen.

Property.name: RippleEffect
Property.HelpText: Enable the ripple effect on the title screen.

Property.name: DrawOverlay
Property.HelpText: Draw a highlight overlay on top of the SA1 logo like in SA International.

Property.name: EnableTransition
Property.HelpText: Enable the logo zoom-in transition when you press Start.

Property.name: DisableAllVideoStuff
Property.HelpText: Disable all video-related functionality, including the FMV fadeout feature. If this setting is enabled, all other settings in this section will be ignored.

Property.name: EnableSA1Intro
Property.HelpText: Use the Dreamcast Sonic Adventure intro recreated from multiple sources in high quality. Can also be used with the original (non-reconstructed) SA1 intro.

Property.name: SonicTeamLogoMode
Property.HelpText: Show the Sonic Team logo before the intro movie: animated (SA1), static (SADX), or disable entirely.

Property.name: ColorizeVideos
Property.HelpText: Dreamcast SA1 uses vertex lighting to adjust video colors. Enabling this makes the FMVs slightly darker, but closer to what they look like on a real Dreamcast.

Property.name: EmeraldCoast
Property.HelpText: Enable SADX-like water in Emerald Coast.

Property.name: StationSquare
Property.HelpText: Enable SADX-like water in Station Square.

Property.name: MysticRuins
Property.HelpText: Enable SADX-like water in the Mystic Ruins.

Property.name: EggCarrier
Property.HelpText: Enable SADX-like water on the Egg Carrier.

Property.name: Past
Property.HelpText: Enable SADX-like water in Mystic Ruins Past.

Property.name: EnableChaoRaceLobby
Property.HelpText: Enable the interactive Chao Race lobby from the Dreamcast version.
